elements.name: Hydrogen
elements.description: Hydrogen is a chemical element with symbol H and atomic number 1. Classified as a nonmetal, hydrogen is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Helium
elements.description: Helium is a chemical element with symbol He and atomic number 2. Classified as a noble gas, helium is a gas at room temperature.

elements.name: Lithium
elements.description: Lithium is a chemical element with symbol Li and atomic number 3. Classified as an alkali metal, lithium is a solid at room temperature.
